DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study understand variation symptom Parkinson disease . This study use iPhone app record symptoms questionnaire sensor .
DOC.brief_title: Mobile Parkinson Observatory Worldwide , Evidence-based Research ( mPower )
DOC.detailed_description: Living Parkinson disease mean cop symptom change every day . Yet change track frequently enough . Most people Parkinson disease see clinician twice year . This study measure change Parkinson disease symptom real time use app . The app remotely monitor Parkinson disease symptom use survey sensor mobile device . This study may contribute increase understanding variability Parkinson disease symptom . This knowledge could use improve quality life people live Parkinson disease .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 year 2 . Have personal ( i.e. , share ) iPhone ( 4 newer run iOS 8.0 later ) 3 . Be able read understand official language country participation 4 . Be able provide inform consent ( i.e. , pas assessment quiz ) 5 . Be willing follow study procedure 1 . Age 17 year younger 2 . Not resident country app approve use 3 .
